name: Instant Tomato-Ricotta 'Soup' With Capers
recipeIngredient: 2 fat ripe tomatoes (about 1 pound), cored and cubed
Large pinch coarse sea salt (fleur de sel is a good choice)
1/2 cup top-quality ricotta, lightly broken into clumps

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl combine tomatoes, oil, basil and salt. Let sit 5 minutes. Gently scatter ricotta on top. (Do not stir in.) Garnish with capers, and serve.
